me.mnafees

Class CanvasShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.mnafees.CanvasShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleCanvasShape, LineCanvasShape, RectangleCanvasShape

    abstract class CanvasShape
extends java.lang.Object
    Container base-class for canvas shapes.

        y - the y coordinate on the canvas

      • contains

        abstract boolean contains(int x,
                          int y)
        Abstract method for subclasses to validate if (x, y) are in the bounds of the shape.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate to test
        y - the y coordinate to test
        Returns:
        true if (x, y) is inside the bounds of the shape and false otherwise
